# Reduce Person, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of powdered iron)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One humanoid creature

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Source: Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 171

*The creature shrinks rapidly before your eyes.*

This spell functions like *[[Reduce Person (Spell)|reduce person]]*, except as noted above.
